rule: The output text should open with the feeling the image should evoke.
input: An air of serene contemplation envelops a lone artist as they sketch in a quiet nook.
output: A solitary artist ensconced in a corner of an art studio, surrounded by piles of sketches and open books, their gaze fixed intently on the page before them under soft late afternoon light, casting gentle shadows and enveloping the scene with a mood of deep reflection and creative resolve.
complianceText:
The output is crafted as a single paragraph and is under 80 words. It describes the subject (a solitary artist), their characteristics (ensconced in a corner, surrounded by sketches and books, gaze fixed intently), the timing and lighting (soft late afternoon light, casting gentle shadows), and the background (art studio). The output concludes by conveying the feeling (mood of deep reflection and creative resolve). All elements of the chatbot description have been followed as per the details provided, without needing input knowledge.

OK
